task.title: Managing meetings
task.shortdesc: You can join, start, pin, copy, edit, and remove meetings from your meeting list.

context.p:
When you tap Meetings from the main menu, a list of meetings that you own and attended opens. They are listed under one of the following tabs.
My Meetings List of meetings that you own.
Scheduled List of scheduled meetings that are on your calendar.
Pinned List of list of meetings that you pinned which is the same as marking them as a favorite.
Recent List of recent meetings that you joined.
You can also join or start a meeting from this screen. See .

From the Meetings screen, swipe right on the meeting name to access the following tasks. Note that not all tasks are available for all meetings.
Copy Copy a meeting link to the clipboard.
Edit Change meeting settings with the exception of the meeting name. You can't change the meeting name. For description of settings, see .
Meeting Recordings View recordings for a meeting. Playing recordings on your mobile device might incur additional fees to your mobile network plan. Recordings are available only for recently recorded meetings, and they are available for a limited time. Tap the to access recordings.
Meeting Reports View reports about the meeting. Tap the menu icon to select the type of report to view or download. See for information about the meeting types and generating reports. Reports are available only for recent meetings.
Pin You can make a meeting a favorite by pinning it. Meetings that you use frequently are a good candidate to be pinned. When you tap the meeting icon in a chat, the list of pinned meetings opens. With pinned meetings, you can to easily send a meeting URL to chat partners.
To remove a meeting, swipe left and tap the delete icon.
